Offers.Title: Online Course: 101 AI Safety Foundations Introduction
Offers.Description: This course takes approximately one hour, covering basic AI topics and terminology with a focus on safety.

Offers.Title: Online Course: 102 AI Safety Foundations Self-Guided
Offers.Description: This course takes approximately 8 hours, covering the safe use of AI in detail, with a focus on the use of AI within an organization.

Offers.Title: Online Course: 110 AI Safety Foundations Instructor-Led
Offers.Description: The Safe AI Foundation workshop is a one-day, hands-on program that equips participants with practical AI skills, ethical and secure usage knowledge, including group activities with other online participants.

Offers.Title: In-Person Course: 201 AI Safety Foundations Certificate Program
Offers.Description: The Safe AI Foundation workshop is a one-day, instructor-led in-person program that equips participants with practical AI skills, ethical and secure usage knowledge, and a certificate of completion to demonstrate their AI literacy.
